text:
We are USA-UES | ONSITE | Los Angeles, CA | Full-time Software Engineers (frontend, backend)

Our mission is to guide children to success in college and beyond.

Want to make huge impact on education? Want to grow with a great company opening a huge market? Join us to secure the future of children today!

Our current stack is PHP (Laravel, Vue.js), AWS, and other technologies.

https://usaues.bamboohr.com/jobs/
